N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

cnt = 0
while all(a % 2 == 0 for a in A):
    A = [a / 2 for a in A]
    cnt += 1

print(cnt)

n = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

count = 0
while all(x % 2 == 0 for x in a):
    a = [x // 2 for x in a]
    count += 1

print(count)



def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

    count = 0
    while all(x % 2 == 0 for x in a):
        a = [x // 2 for x in a]
        count += 1

    print(count)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

print(a*b*c)


N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

cnt = 0
while all(a % 2 == 0 for a in A):
    A = [a / 2 for a in A]
    cnt += 1


print(cnt)

N = int(input())
A = [int(input()) for i in range(N)]

cnt = 0
while all(a % 2 == 0 for a in A):
    A = [a // 2 for a in A]
    cnt += 1

print(cnt)
